name: YTTracker
author: Thomas Couchoud <zerderr@gmail.com> (https://github.com/MrCraftCod/)
description: This extension will track your time on YouTube

scripts.chromeInit: npm run init && cp -R chrome/* temp
scripts.chromeManifest: cd temp && cp manifestProd.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.chromeManifestBeta: cd temp && cp manifestTest.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.chromePackage: npm run includes && cd temp && zip -r chromeExtension.zip ./* -x "*.DS_Store" && cd ../ && mv temp/chromeExtension.zip chromeExtension.zip
scripts.chromeBuild: npm run chromeInit && npm run chromeManifest && npm run chromePackage && npm run clean
scripts.chromeBuildBeta: npm run chromeInit && npm run chromeManifestBeta && npm run chromePackage && npm run clean
scripts.chromeRelease: npm run chromeBuild && npm run chromeSend && npm run chromeClear && npm run chromeReleaseBeta
scripts.chromeReleaseBeta: npm run chromeBuildBeta && npm run chromeSendBeta && npm run chromeClear
scripts.firefoxInit: npm run init && cp -R firefox/* temp
scripts.firefoxManifest: cd temp && cp manifestProd.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.firefoxManifestBeta: cd temp && cp manifestTest.json manifest.json && cd ../
scripts.firefoxPackage: npm run includes && cd temp && zip -r firefoxExtension.xpi ./* -x "*.DS_Store" && cd ../ && mv temp/firefoxExtension.xpi firefoxExtension.xpi
scripts.firefoxBuild: npm run firefoxInit && npm run firefoxManifest && npm run firefoxPackage && npm run clean
scripts.firefoxBuildBeta: npm run firefoxInit && npm run firefoxManifestBeta && npm run firefoxPackage && npm run clean
